subject: We need to contact you
body:
Our records are indicating that your current dosage should
be running low or expired.
Since you are a repeat customer we will offer you a value
discount on all future orders with us.
 
To ensure privacy only some of your account details have
been posted below:

Thanks
 
Viagonline Inc.
Chaya Bump

NOTE: This electronic message and attachment(s), if any, 
contains information which is intended solely for the designated
